content: UFC 278Multi Master Challenge   1st place: 2 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 1 mBTC Free Bet3rd place: .5 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1 point)b)  Predict how many Total Strikes Match 13 winner will score (if it's a draw, the highest of the two Total Strikes scored will be used)Matches13) Kamaru Usman vs. Leon Edwards 12) Luke Rockhold vs. Paulo Costa11) Jose Aldo vs. Merab Dvalishvili10) Marcin Tybura vs. Alexandr Romanov9) Tyson Pedro vs. Harry Hunsucker8) Leonardo Santos vs. Jared Gordon7) Wu Yanan vs. Lucie Pudilova6) Sean Woodson vs. Luis Saldana5) Miranda Maverick vs. Shanna Young4) A.J.
